General.Name: ValueHD Corp. A
General.Description: ValueHD Corporation manufactures and sells video conferencing equipment. The company offers video conference cameras, video conferencing systems, box cameras, microphones, broadcasr indoor remote pan tilts, and multipoint control units (MCU). The company offers its products for education, healthcare, political and law, and broadcasting and TV fields. ValueHD Corporation was founded in 2008 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: No.2, Honghui Industrial Park, Shenzhen, China, 518001
